item.description:
Want to know how to fund your deal?

Be sure to attend this month's Boston AREIA meeting -- we'll have a finance panel that can answer your questions about funding deals!

Ann Bellamy will discuss why hard money doesn't mean hard to get, and it doesn't mean the lender is a hard arse - she'll take the hard part out of hard money and make it easy to:

Get a pre-approval letter to present with your offer
Understand when it makes sense to use hard money
Figure out how much you can borrow
Present your deal to us properly so it's likely to be funded
